Name: Caribe Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Nutrition: One serving of Caribe Daiquiri contains 188 calories
